title: Set category-based pricing: 3D ocarinas to $9, ceramic ocarinas to $19

requirements.text: Update all items in the '3D Printed' category to have a price of $9.00 (900 cents)
acceptanceCriteria: All items with category '3D Printed' display a price of $9.00 on the storefront
The price change persists across application restarts

requirements.text: Update all items in the 'Ceramic' category to have a price of $19.00 (1900 cents)
acceptanceCriteria: All items with category 'Ceramic' display a price of $19.00 on the storefront
The price change persists across application restarts

requirements.text: Create an admin interface that allows bulk price updates by category, enabling future price changes without code modifications
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel includes a section for setting prices by category
Admins can select a category and specify a new price
Price changes apply to all items in the selected category
UI shows confirmation of how many items were updated

constraints: Preserve the existing ItemCategory enum structure in backend/main.mo
Do not modify the PriceEditor component; create a separate bulk pricing interface
Maintain the single-actor architecture with all logic in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Changing individual item prices beyond the category-based update
Modifying the category structure or adding new categories
Implementing per-item price overrides that ignore category defaults
